template.description: Sets the cursor to the begin of the expression
template.name: beg

template.description: Casts the expression to a new type
template.name: cast

template.description: Creates a do-while loop
template.name: dowhile

template.description: Creates a negated if statement
template.name: else

template.description: Creates a for statement
template.name: for

template.description: Creates a for statement which iterates over an array
template.name: fori

template.description: Creates a for statement which iterates over an array in reverse order
template.name: forr

template.description: Creates an if statement and checks it the expression does not resolve to null
template.name: nnull

template.description: Creates an if statement which checks the expression if it resolves to null
template.name: null

template.description: Creates a short if statement
template.name: sif

template.description: Creates an if statement which checks if the expression resolves not to null
template.name: snnull

template.description: Creates a short if statement which checks for null
template.name: snull

template.description: Sends the affected string to a System.out.println(..) call
template.name: sysout

template.description: Throws the given Exception
template.name: throw

template.description: Creates a new variable
template.name: var

template.description: Creates a while loop
template.name: while

template.description: Creates an if statement which checks if a given numeric variable is within a region
template.name: withinregion

template.description: Creates a new field
template.name: field

template.description: Creates a new private constant
template.name: constpriv

template.description: Creates a new public constant
template.name: constpub
